greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length of the longest prefix of 1's in the Jacobi-vector {J(2n+1,1),J(2n+1,2),...,J(2n+1,2n)}.
mathematica: a112046[n_]:=Block[{i=1}, While[JacobiSymbol[i, 2n + 1]==1, i++]; i]; Table[a112046[n] - 1, {n, 102}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017 *)
program: from sympy import jacobi_symbol as J
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 103)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 24 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 27 2005
